articles.summary: A White Marubozu is a bullish candlestick pattern in technical analysis. articles.summary: Prima facie, the AI rules should make internet platforms better monitored for deepfake content that modifies a person’s identity without consent. However, the implementation remains to be seen.

articles.title: Mint Explainer: New basket, same inflation story? The math behind India’s CPI reset
articles.summary: India’s statistics ministry has released a ‘back series' for the Consumer Price Index (CPI) using the new base year of 2024. But it needs to be read with caution. Mint explains why.

articles.title: Explained | What kept India’s gem and jewellery exports steady in April-January 2026 despite US slump
articles.summary: India’s gem and jewellery exports held steady at $23.19B, with US shipments down 45% but growth in UAE, Hong Kong, Australia, France, Belgium, Thailand, Israel.

articles.title: Explained | Why US trade deal with Bangladesh has sunk Indian textile stocks?
articles.summary: Bangladesh secures US zero-duty access for garments using US cotton, raising concerns for Indian cotton exporters. Experts see limited impact, with integrated Indian firms better positioned.
